text: 1:2 Rom 16:25; Kolosi 1:27; 2 Timoti 1:1; 1:9; 1 Pita 1:20Kɨ me damutɨ, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikɨva, egh God me danɨngamin zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim mɨzuamam. Fomɨra fomɨra nguazir kam otozir puvatɨzir dughiamɨn, an akar dɨkɨrɨzim e ganigha gɨvagha ghaze, a ikɨrɨmɨrir kam e danɨngam. A Godɨn ifarir puvatɨzim.
